allQuestions.text: You are losing memory. Accept the UFO challenge?

answers.finalText: You declined the challenge. Game over.

allQuestions.text: You accepted the challenge. Go to the captain's bridge?

answers.text: Refuse to go to the bridge
answers.finalText: You didn't go to negotiations. Game over.

allQuestions.text: You went to the bridge. Who are you?

answers.finalText: You were sent back home. Victory
Your lie was exposed. Game over.
